page.title: 02FARMING AROUND WOLVERLEY
page.content: The area is one of{mixed farming}on mainly{sandy soils }with the emphasis on the grazing of cattle and sheep. There are eight farms in the grid ranging in size from a smallholding of a few acres to one of over 100 acres. Alandale Farm is a poultry farm with several thousand hens as well as chicks. Blakeshall Farm has a herd of dairy cattle and grows potatoes and sugar beet. Bay Horse Farm has over 200 sheep. The main market is in Kidderminster. The other farms in the area are mixed farms of varying sizes.
